title: What are Twisted Fate's cards made out of?
body: They can penetrate animals, metal, rock, etc. So what are they made out of? Magic? Steel? Hextech craft?

replies.body:
I'm no lore expert, but I have these, and they're made of paper. Pretty sure they're just a replica though, 'cause I can't do all the fancy stuff he can do. I can just throw these and mildly annoy people. >_>

https://scontent.fsnc1-2.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/11822825_10152844918556353_2424201084655605876_n.jpg?oh=512ca6aa0a19970843a44ee0a66c63fd&oe=57F523DC

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JOA7ypfQ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-06-23T19:20:45.417+0000)
>
> I'm no lore expert, but I have these, and they're made of paper. Pretty sure they're just a replica though, 'cause I can't do all the fancy stuff he can do. I can just throw these and mildly annoy people. >_>
> 
> https://scontent.fsnc1-2.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/11822825_10152844918556353_2424201084655605876_n.jpg?oh=512ca6aa0a19970843a44ee0a66c63fd&oe=57F523DC

I'm faaaaairly sure that TF is just giving people brutal paper cuts.
paper cuts are no joke. they hurt man.

They hurt, because they are very shallow, so nerve endings are directly exposed to air, unlike for deeper(ish) cuts, which are covered with even miniscule amount of blood.

http://commentphotos.com/gallery/CommentPhotos.com_1407344983.jpg?noredirect
Accurate.

Come now, don't sell yourself short. I'm sure you can do a lot better than "mildly".

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
What is the blue card? I can never tell. Is it an eye?
Yes
A magician never reveals their tricks!
Its magically delicious

Paper

and mmmmmmagic

http://i.imgur.com/YsbKHg1.gif?noredirect

They're basically regular cards which he infuses with River Man magic. Lorewise we've only seen him making them explode, so no stuns or magic restoration (yellow card, blue card) so far. He can also flicker any of them through his fingers to visualize where he wants to teleport.
"It's the Heart of the Cards"{{champion:4}}
I think this is a bug kindred passive does not work

So the body of each card is made of a sort of magic infused steel, which is hollow. He makes sure to have some sharper diamond dust infused steel on the edges to stay sharp and penetrate. Each is weighted just right for throwing, and as long as he applies force, he can cut through you.
Nice made up story ^^
What else could it be?

The thing cards are usually made out of. Paper.
To me it seems like he just uses magic to make his cards stronger.
I meant a made up story >.>
Im sure they are normal cards, infused with his magic.He seems to infuse all kimd of cards with magic very quickly, as he uses his magic in every single card game

I'd assume that he, being someone with a decent bit of magical power, infuses each card with magic as he throws it, allowing it's already thin design to be deadly and cutting, rather than just mildly annoying. Also how he has the AoE and stunning cards with his W, just a myriad of personal enchantments imbued on the cards as they're thrown.

Graves' tears

{{champion:104}}{{item:3070}}
paper probably if the cards he was playing with in twist of fate are anything to go by.
